1: <pb/>Nabe, catinpixbej chi quiban ch'awem ruc' Dios. Quiban bochi'nic, tz'ononic xukuje' maltioxinic paquiwi' conojel ri winak.
2: <pb/>Chibana' ch'awem ruc' Dios paquiwi' ri ajawinelab paquiwi' conojel ri e k'atal tak tzij rech cujcuinic cujc'oji' pa utzil xukuje' pa jamaril nim kila' wi ri Dios ruc' jun c'aslemal ri kas utz quilic.
3: <pb/>Are c'u utz wa' xukuje' cäkaj chuwäch ri ka Colonel Dios;
4: <pb/>ri Dios cäraj chi quecolotaj ri winak chi nimalaj conojel, xukuje' chi cäquetamaj ri kastzij.
5: <pb/>Xa' c'u jun Dios c'olic, xukuje' xa' jun ch'awenel paquiwi' ri winak chuwäch ri Dios, are jun achi, ri Crist Jesus.
6: <pb/>Rumal rech chi xujach rib ri Jesucrist pa u k'ab ri cämical che u tojic ri rajil ri colobal ib chque conojel, jas ri u cholajil ri k'alajisanic ri xya' pa ri kas u k'ijol.
7: <pb/>In cojom che tzijonel xukuje' takom. In cojom che qui tijoxic ri man aj judeyib taj che ri cojonic xukuje' che ri kastzij. Quinbij ri kastzij, man quinban ta tzij.
8: <pb/>Quinwaj c'ut chi ri winak pa conojel c'olbal cäquiban ch'awem ruc' Dios chequiwalijisaj ri qui k'ab ruc' jun ch'ajch'ojalaj canima', man c'o ta oyowal mawi c'ulelam tak ib.
9: <pb/>Xukuje' quinwaj chi ri ixokib utz catz'iakixic quib caquibano, ruc' jicomal, xukuje' cuc' atz'iak ri man nimak ta cajil. Chi ri ixokib macoc'owisaj u suc'umaxic ri qui wi', mequicoj wikbal ri pakal cajil jacha' ri k'an puak xukuje' ri tak perl, mawi chequicoj ta atz'iak ri sibalaj pakal cajil.
10: <pb/>Xane' ruc' utzalaj tak chac, jas ri ya'tal chque ri ixokib ri cäquik'ijilaj ri Dios.
11: <pb/>Rajawaxic chi ri ixokib cäquita' ri tijonic ruc' nimanic pa ronojel, mech'awic.
12: <pb/>Ri in man quinya' ta che jun ixok chi quebutijoj achijab, mawi cätakan paquiwi', xane' rajawaxic xak jun quec'oji' wi.
13: <pb/><f>[1]</f>Rumal rech chi are nabe xban ri Adan, c'äte ri' ri Eva.
14: <pb/>Xukuje' ri Adan man are ta ri xsubutajic, xane' are ri ixok xsubutajic, xtzak pa mac.
15: <pb/>Ri ixok cacolotaj c'u na cumal ri ralanic xukuje' we caken chupam ri cojonic, chupam ri lok'ok'enic, xukuje' chupam ri u tasic rib man cutakej ta chi c'u ri macunic, c'o c'u u tij puwi' chbil rib.
